recommended_degree: Informatika, Sistem Informasi, Teknik Elektro, Teknik Telekomunikasi, Teknik Komputer Dan Jaringan (Sarjana)
job_description:
1)	Design and build applications for Web, Android platforms and Ensure performance and quality of the application, using existing development system in Huawei.
2) Responsible for translating from digitalization requirements to automation function, after collecting user requirement.
3) Work out solution design, and develop applications as per biz user requirements, proceed function tests and complete UAT.
4) Support requirements collection and output business requirements document, and get user signed off. 
5) Manage the applications, tools into operations, keep improvements and maintain the applications works.
6) Collaborate with cross functional team to define and design the app and Perform checks on correct functionality of app.
7) Integrate application with backend tools such as cloud, APIs and push notifications.
8) Use encryption tools to safeguard content and Can develop with PHP, C & Java programming.
